pageContent: Rationale, aims and objective: This study aimed to determine if urologists' feelings on prostate cancer screening with prostate-specific antigen (PSA) and treatment on themselves are consistent with what they recommend to patients.

metaData.source:
Evaluating psychological support services available for men living with prostate cancer and their carers and families across England
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31769921/
